Silence::

She wiped her optics and took in a deep breath.  The anger of a
forgotten past will have to wait.  She must self focus on the issues
at hand. Right now she would have to learn more about her present
situation in order to be of greater help with her new found friends.
She transformed into barn owl mode and flew down the hallways of the
base.  As she flew, she heard the sounds of sobbing and low voices
eminating from the mess hall.  She thought it best to not get involved
and fly past.  As she did so, she saw Megatron with a female bot.  In
mid-air, she transformed into bot mode and dropped to the floor.  She
stood there in the doorway for a moment, her hatred for Decepticons
glaring on her optics.  Noting that he was not harming her and that he
was supposed to be on thier side, she turned and walked away. As she
walked down the hall, she thought about her mind block.  She started
to walk towards the entrance doors. "If I can find the back-up chip, I
can remember and perhaps find out what is going on. Or at least what
went on."She made her way to the entrance and transformed into bot
mode.  She took to the skies and went out in search of her pod.

It took only a little while before she found it. Inside the pod, under
a small and well hidden panel was a tiny microchip.  The case was
dusty as ever, but the chip showed no damage.  With the chip in her
grasp, she returned to the base.

She walked in and headed for her quarters.
